author: Anonymous Scale
title: waitlist
question: Hi guys. Does anyone know when we will find out after the waitlist quiz if we have gotten into the course? I am planning on dropping another course if I do get into this course, however, the last day to drop without a w is next Friday. Thanks for any information.
instructor_answer: Waitlist students who pass the waitlist quiz will be moved into the course before the add/drop deadline on Friday, January 21.
